facts.text: I'm born as a boy, but I can become a girl! All clownfish start as males, and the biggest one in the group becomes female.
I live inside sea anemones that would sting other fish! I have a special slimy coating that protects me.
I help my anemone friend by cleaning off parasites and bringing it food scraps. We're best buddies!
My family can double in size in less than 15 months! That's why there are so many of us in the ocean.
Dad does most of the babysitting! Male clownfish guard the eggs and fan them with their fins to give them oxygen.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific Ocean

facts.text: I can breathe air! I have a special organ called a labyrinth that lets me gulp air from the surface.
I build bubble nests to protect my babies! I blow bubbles at the surface and stick my eggs inside them.
I'm called the Siamese fighting fish because males like me are very protective of our territory.
I come from rice paddies and canals in Thailand where the water has very little oxygen. That's why I learned to breathe air!
I love to eat mosquito babies! In the wild, I help control mosquito populations by eating their larvae.

profile.habitat: Rice paddies, floodplains, and canals in Southeast Asia
profile.diet: Mosquito larvae, zooplankton, and small insects

facts.text: I can puff up to twice my size! When I'm scared, I swallow water super fast to become a big spiky ball.
I have a secret weapon called tetrodotoxin - it's one of the most powerful poisons in nature! It keeps predators away.
I don't have scales like other fish. Instead, I have thick, rough skin that's really tough!
My teeth never stop growing! They're fused together like a beak, and I use them to crack open shellfish and coral.
Some of my relatives are artists! Male pufferfish create beautiful circular patterns in the sand to attract females.

profile.habitat: Tropical and subtropical ocean waters worldwide
profile.size: 1 inch to 2 feet depending on species

facts.text: My memory is way better than people think! I can remember things for months, not just 3 seconds. That's a myth!
I can live for 30 years! With good care, I can be your friend for a really, really long time.
I can grow almost 2 feet long if I have enough space! Most people don't know how big I can get.
I'm super tough! I can survive in water with very little oxygen and even handle some pollution.
I've been a pet for over 1,000 years! People in ancient China first started keeping my ancestors as pets.

profile.habitat: Ponds, lakes, and slow-moving rivers in East Asia
profile.diet: Plants, algae, insects, and small crustaceans

facts.text: I'm a coral reef superhero! I eat algae that could smother the coral, helping keep the reef healthy.
I have a sharp spine near my tail that pops out like a tiny sword when I'm scared! It's called a scalpel.
My bright blue color comes from special cells in my skin. I can even change how bright I look!
I love to hang out in groups! We swim together in schools for safety and to find the best algae snacks.
At night, I find a cozy spot in the coral and tuck myself in to sleep. I need my beauty rest!

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific Ocean
